import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from time import sleep
import pandas as pd
posts = bs.find(class_='rows') #looked through developer to find class id

source: first_listing.find('a',href=True) #narrowed down to class a as long as it has an href

listing_titles = [] #loop same as first listing, for all listings
listing_urls = []

for listing in listings:
    listing_title = listing.find('a',class_='result-title hdrlnk')
    listing_title_text = listing_title.text
    listing_titles.append(listing_title_text)
    listing_url = listing_title['href']
    listing_urls.append(listing_url)
print('\n')

#set up loop to search for keywords and place in empty list keyword_links
keyword_links=[]
for link in listing_urls:
    print('red flag', link)
    testlink = requests.get(link)
    bslink = BeautifulSoup(testlink.text, 'html.parser')
    sleep(15)
    bodies = bslink.find(id='postingbody')
    #try looks for exceptions in the loop and prints error if no text in body
    try:
        if 'mattress' in bodies.text:
            mattress=('mattress', link)
            keyword_links.append(mattress)
        if 'cabinet' in bodies.text:
            cabinet=('cabinet',link)
            keyword_links.append(cabinet)
        if 'wrench' in bodies.text:
            wrench=('wrench',link)
            keyword_links.append(wrench)
    except:
        print('error')

print("Completed Task")
